entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RSA.VerifyData terminates with "Out of memory." on Linux when passing an all-zero modulus #78293
  • simd-intrinsics.c:2149, condition `size' not met #78290
  • Importing `pal.h` causes undeclared identifier because of order of macro definitions #78286
  • Cross architecture CLRDEBUGINFO<host_os><host_arch> resource missing on windows coreclr #78282
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Mono-flavored runtime never uses system libunwind #78284
  • ARM64: Missing combine eor+lsr and duplicate constant reloads #78263
  • EventSource::SendManifest causes lost events which result in unmergable ETL files #77014
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [meta] do the bug fix #78294
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reserve memory for FOH in-range #78292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix some asserts caused by #78182. #78291
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove unused method on CngKey #78289
    area-System.Security
  • Put GenericTypeDefinition into genericCache to try to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • fix MulticastLoopback option for IPv6 #78285
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #78283
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Fix `--singlemethodname` #78207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • `ComputeManagedAssembliesToCompileToNative`: Make `microsoft.netcore.app` check case-insensitive. #78022
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nullable annotations in ITypeDescriptorContext #78287
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #78213
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add .NET 7 perf post to deep-dive blog list #78281
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Removing obsolete references to 'emitMaxTmpSize' #78199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Disable Reflection, IL scanner, RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #1992

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enhance dumps, enable LIR checking, implement `FLOAT` returns #2082
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add a dependency for the constructed eetype for newobj #2081

Merged

  • Split RyuJit backend into multiple files #2077

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Commands like `dotnet nuget push --help` do not give help, but forcing an error does #29048

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2043844 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `IDE0241` is not reported when found attribute #65401

Closed

  • incorrect ref escape check for expression body #65388
    17.5
  • Use of `static abstract` interface members on .NET 6 produces incorrect error #65361
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent FileNotFoundException #65402
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix crash in parameter refactoring #63351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ANCM native module hanging in early initialisation #45066
  • Razor inserts too many spaces when formatting (LF instead CRLF in file) #45065
  • .net 6 aspnet minimal api not using the System.Text.Json source generator? #45064
  • EmptyHttpResult is not straightforward to be used in type checking #45063
  • [BUG] Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project. #45061
  • QuickGrid: when navigating from the page hosting the grid , it calls grid Items , casing "A second operation was started on this context instance before ..." #45059
  • QuickGrid: Add a loading event when loading data from EF #45058
  • QuickGrid: Cant Add AuthorizeView inside TemplateColumn #45057
  • Parse named pipe endpoint from URL with BindingAddress #45056

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OAuth still using Newtonsoft #45060
  • System.NullReferenceException: at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType #43339
    Discussions
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45031
  • Blazor User Blocked from Downloading DLL Files #45018

PullRequests

Created

  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45055
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45054
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Updated

  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2044094 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect layout with RefreshView, CollectionView that has an GridItemsLayout on iPhone #11327
  • ScrollView does not work correctly on Windows #11326
  • Label not changing text #11325
  • [IOS] Maui .Net7 Debug Crashing on Physical Device - The app has been terminated. #11324
  • ListView with ObservableCollection issue during scrolling (ObjectDisposedException) #11323
  • Infrared sensor #11322
  • Thread safe issues about PathFigureCollectionConverter #11321
  • Incorrect spacing with CollectionView that has an GridItemsLayout on Windows #11320
  • Compiler warning when using deprecated API on old version of Android #11319

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Icon Stretched #11291

PullRequests

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.5 to 1.2.221109.1 #11280
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
